participant_1.background:
I miss my family when I'm busy with work.
I love listening to rap music with my dog.
my grandma raised me.
I have a brand new car to match my new mansion.
I play the piano to relax and keep my mind off of my diabetes and fears.

participant_2.background:
I'm always on the move, so my clothing needs to be comfortable and functional.
I secretly watch wrestling to take my mind off the stress of running my juicing bar.
i met my husband when i was a freshman in college.
i own 4 cats.
i ride a bike.

content.text: Heyy! What's up? I'm pretty stoked about my new car.
I'm good! I just got back from a bike ride with my cats.
Cats! I have 4 too. They're so much fun.
They are, aren't they? I love watching them play.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch wrestling, it helps me take my mind off the stress of running my juicing bar.
Juicing bar? That's cool! I play the piano to relax.
That's really interesting! I love music, but I can't play any instruments.
You should try it! It's really fun.
I'll think about it! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I really like rap.
Me too! I love listening to rap music with my dog.
That's awesome! I wish my cats would listen to music with me.
They might if you played it really loud!
I'll have to give it a try
